name: AR Friends - Augmented Reality
description:
Augmented Reality virtual friend simulator!
Take your lifelike buddy with you everywhere you go!

Play and interact with your very own virtual friend:
* Play dress-up with a huge amount of clothes to choose from.
* Make sure your buddy is never bored!
* Treat your friend to some good food to keep him fed and happy!
* Bring your pal into the real world with AR!
* Play catch to ensure you're both having fun!
* Awesome toys and food to collect!

PLEASE NOTE:
AR Friends is a free download, but it does feature optional in-app purchases which cost real money.
